appDescription.message: Find documents in devdocs.io with a popup window from a Chrome Extension!

p1.message: This extension is used for showing up a popup window for searching documents in Devdocs, to avoid opening a single browser tab.

p2.message: The default hotkey of showing the popup window is <kbd>Alt</kbd>+<kbd>S</kbd>. If you want to edit this, go to the bottom of Chrome's extensions page (Menu -> More tools -> Extensions).

p3.message: The default enabled documents are CSS, DOM, DOM Events, HTML, HTTP, and JavaScript.

p4.message: To select the certain documents you need, like Node, Python or Angular.js, go to devdocs.io and check them out.
